content:
Changes are:

  • A mistake on my part changed the implicitness of arguments in ite_eq_right_iff and friends. This will revert again tomorrow. Sorry.
  • I've had to replace some rfl proofs with simp proofs; I didn't look particularly carefully, but some of the rfls at least looked a bit surprising that they worked, so I'm not sad to replace them.
  • A test in test/ValuedCSP.lean is failing, and I've just commented it out and asked Martin to take a look later.
Lgtm modulo a missing space at bodd_one
